content:
Hi all, can anyone tell me the codes for these below roles .
Cdi Specialist, Chief Hospitalist, Developer, IT Department, IT Admin, IT Developer, Intern and Super Admin.
It's possible there aren't standard codes for those. Note that "IT Department" doesn't sound like a role for an individual, but more like an organization

Hi @Mounika Have a look at our solution, iHRIS, to see how we approach practitioner roles. It's a GUI in front of HAPI as an HRIS and open source. Maybe that will help. https://github.com/iHRIS/iHRIS/tree/master/resources

Hi all,
I wanted to know the duties of Case Manager, Utilization Manager and Discharge Liaison in a Hospital.
Can anyone tell me.
